# inputFormat(forBus:)

**Instance Method**

Gets the input format for the bus you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
func inputFormat(forBus bus: AVAudioNodeBus) -> AVAudioFormat
```

## Parameters

- **bus**: An audio node bus.

## Return Value

An [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioFormat] instance that represents the input format of the bus.

## Related Documentation

- **AVFoundation Programming Guide**

## Configuring an Input Format Bus

- **AVAudioNodeBus**: The index of a bus on an audio node.
- **name(forInputBus:)**: Gets the name of the input bus you specify.
- **numberOfInputs**: The number of input busses for the node.
